name: study1_cohort_vhir
title: Hospitalized Patients with Primary Diagnosis of Heart Failure
description: This cohort includes patients hospitalized with a primary discharge diagnosis of heart failure. The primary discharge diagnosis refers to the main clinical condition responsible for the hospital admission.

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

entry.name: patientEncounter
entry.description: Captures hospital encounters when a patient is admitted for care.

period.description: Includes all hospital encounters for the defined cohort population.

eligibility.name: adults
eligibility.description: Exclude Patients who are younger than 18 years old at the time of admission.

eligibility.name: lengthOfStay
eligibility.description: Filters encounters where patient was not discharged on the same day of admission.
